statements.sentence: ..and I did not see her since that moment.
You think those junkies did something to her?
Did not think they're aggressive at anykind..
I heard that guy in glasses talking to his kid.
He told him to stay out from that vault.
In any case, this is a supply vault. It cannot be empty
Yeah. But is it reasonable to go there?
You saw that girl..poor thing..doubt she's happy about..well..anything
I think I might get a shot.
Whoa. You serious?
Whoa..but passage there is blocked.
Any options 'bout that, Genny?
Hmm..Lock looks realy solid. You wont brake it..
That guy with the kid! Maybe he knows some workarounds?
Guess so..he looks like craftsman of some kind..
Okay, I'm gonna check him out
So that guy in glasses..okay
*coughs
Wha..what? I'm busy here.
I was just wondering if..
Shh..shh..stop.
I'm trying to find some toys for my kid
And unless you cannot help me, why would I?
Oh, ehmm..okay, sorry..
Guess I should checkout kid.
Aha. So, you got the nails.
Let's see what we can do..
*mumbling with concentrated face
Here. Hope that helps.
You'd better ask around if someone can teach you how to pick locks.
Takes quite a time if you don't know what you are doing.
Thanks!
And kiddo..whatch out there. I heard bad rumors about that place..
See that girl at the campfire? She's been there. Check her out.
I will, thanks!
I head you helped my kid. Thanks.
*sigh
So, what's all the fuss about?
I was wondering if you can help me to get to the vault
*spits
Not an easy thing to do..as well as not safe.
Entrance is secured by lock and I don't have anything to remove it.
I can make a lockpick for you, if that's the case
Just get me some nails and I'll do the trick
Ok, thanks, I'try to find some.
Should not take long in such a garbige place..
Hey. Playing around?
Yup. There are plenty of places to hide around here.
That friend of yours.. He's kinda..meany?
Nah. He just lost everyone in that war. Then he found me
Now he has someone to care about.
I really need to talk to him. Can you help me with that?
Weeeell, I could do that. But you gonna help me too. Deal?
Sure. What's up?
I've lost all my toys..can you find at least one for me?
Yeah, sure.
I will try to figure it out.
Maybe I can find some toys around here..
Wha..what do you want? Can't you see I'm busy?
Get out!
Ehm..sure..
Weeeirdoo..
Hey there. What are you doing here?
Shhh! I'm playing hide and seek with my friend.
He's there, you see him?
*points south
Hmm..yeh..
Oh! He looks here! Get out until he saw me!
Okay, okay..
Here you are. Do you like it?
Oh heall yeah! Just look at him! He is almost like new!
Thanks! I'll tell my friend to talk to you.
*smiles
Take care.
..and they got that old padlock. Took me seconds to get in theirs..
..oh hello there, lady. Spying on us?
..just look at here face..bet she does not know what that word means.
How rude of you! Now you kid, take a walk out of here. Got it?
Sure..
..and, here is my favorite student! Bonjour!
*blushes
She is already a member of..?
No, no, don't think she might fit yet in our humble family.
Hey, sweety. If you'll do well in picking locks I bet you'll find some good friends.
Understood?
Well..yeah, I suppose..
Awesome. Hang out with gang of thiefs.
That's what my mama always dreamed for me...
Hey Gen
Yeah, sup?
Do you have something with lock on it?
Hmm..let me see..
*looks for something in her bag
Yeah, I got a pair of old handcuffs. So?
Soo..would you mind giving them to me? Pleeease.
Sure. Give me something for them and we'll have a deal.
Alrighty..take a look.
Here are some handcuffs. Does that fit?
Hmm..yeah, that will do.
So, insert tension wrench into the bottom of key hole and apply slight pressure
Then, stick pick in the top of the lock
Now, applying slight torque to your wrench..
And, while doing that, scrub your pick back and forth in the key hole.
See, it's pretty easy. Repeat unitill all pins set.
Thanks! I'go and practice now. Take care.
That's a joy to help such a lady. See ya.
Hey there. Would you mind helping me?
Oh, sure, my pleasure to help such a lady.
So, what can I do for you?
Can you please teach me how to pick locks?
Well..actually, I do not mind.
But I need something with the lock to show you the tricks.
Ok, I'll try to find something suitable.
I bet Genny has some junk with her..
Aand you want to get to the vault, right?
Well..yes..and how you..
And that guy over there told you that I might know some..
*thinks with eyes closed.
..rumors? That's how he put it?
Does she read thoughts?
*smiles sadly
Liisten closely.
*sigh
There are cultists there. Fanatics. Just..
Just try no to mess with them, okay?
Okay, okay..
I mean it. You don't even know into what you might get into..
Clearly not worthy price for cuople of beef stakes you can PROBABLY find there..
Sure..thanks for advice..
Gosh..
Gonna come back to it later..
Sorry, I'm in a rush!
Maybe I shouldn't just leave like that?
I'm sorry but I got to go!
Booooring..
Okay, I'm in.
Guess I may go past that fellow, so he doesn't see me.
